desc: Hi Juan Bernabe R.,i m planing to shoot some demo in argentina, it ll be a documentary and a tv show.. i ll write u the details now, hope u can help me about it..project 1 (about football)lacation  :  argentina / buenos airesmatch : boca - river* make shoting in buenos aires city and give information about the city with voice over (city shooting)* interview with 2 supporter at the age of 50-60 from both side and take information about rivalry (past times)* interview with 2 supporter at the age of 18-25 from both side and take information about rivalry (actual time)* if possible and wont be expensive interview with 2 old player from both side* interview with some people in the city and learn how their life change in the match days (sellers-policemen-street cleaners etc...)* make shoting inside the stadium with the supporters (not the match, i m interested in supporters reaction)* interview with supporters after the match (hear what they are thinking after the result)interview  :  minimum 6 maximum 10 peopleshooting days  :  4 daysproject 2 (about competition)lacation  :  argentina / buenos aires ( i m open for your recommendation about location. tango / pato / argentina steak stages in competition )* 2 presenter come to buenos aires city with their back bag, and start to walk in the city, we learn information about the city in the same time* than they ll visit someone, he/she is a tango teacher (no need famous, but a good one) and tell him/her that they want to learn tango and they have 3 days for it, in the third day they ll show what they learn and teacher ll chose a winner between them* than they ll visit someone, he/she is a good cook (no need famous, but a good one) and tell him/her that they want to learn cooking argentina steak and they have 3 days for it, in the third day they ll show what they learn and teacher ll chose a winner between them*  than they ll visit someone, he is a pato sporter (no need famous, but a good one) and tell him that they want to learn and play this game, they have 3 days for it, in the third day they ll show what they learn and teacher ll chose a winner between them* finally someone win 2-1 after all the games and has a change to shose the next country for the games, winner also ll stay in the hotel and eat at the restourant in the next country but looser ll stay in tent or maybe in park in somewhere and eat with his own facilityin this programe, our presenters in their free time walk in the city and show us buenos aires and argentina culture alsostage teacher  :  3 peopleshooting days  :  6 days
